titleStmt.title: Dialogues containing all the most vsefull vvords of the Latine tongue And a Latine oration concerning the way of learning, and teaching the Latine and Greeke tongues. Written by Iohn Posselius. And word for word for the most part construed out of Latine into English.
Oikeōn dialogōn biblion hellēnisti kai Rōmaisti. English
titleStmt.author: Posselius, Johannes, 1565-1623.

titleStmt.title: Dialogues containing all the most vsefull vvords of the Latine tongue And a Latine oration concerning the way of learning, and teaching the Latine and Greeke tongues. Written by Iohn Posselius. And word for word for the most part construed out of Latine into English.
Oikeōn dialogōn biblion hellēnisti kai Rōmaisti. English
titleStmt.author: Posselius, Johannes, 1565-1623.
Reeve, Edmund, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde, and are to be sold by [Edmund Reeve at] Christ-Church greater South doore,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Edmund Reeve, of Oikeōn dialogōn biblion hellēnisti kai Rōmaisti, published in 1622 (STC 20128.3).
Pages 28,29 and 30 misnumbered 29-28 and 22; 31-38 missing in number only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
